alert.note: Alert for Mendocino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 10:57PM PST until January 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Russian River near Hopland affecting Mendocino County. For the Russian River...including Hopland...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Russian River near Hopland. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of Highway 222 near Ukiah. Secondary roads in low-lying areas will be flooded in the Hopland, Ukiah, and Talmage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM PST Saturday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 17.8 feet late tonight. It will t to 4.2 feet Tuesday evening. It will rise to 6.6 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage.hen fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.6 feet on 01/18/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 pm PST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Russian River Hopland 15.0 14.5 Sat 10 pm PS 7.1 4.8 4.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/eka. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1000 AM PST.
